data.description:
Throughout the Japanese Kamakura period Zen Garden’s became a place to look upon and within. During this time the Imperial Court created a new class called the Samauri Warrior. Samauri visited Zen Garden’s to help achieve mindfulness and calm in the heart of battle.

Design and rake Zen Garden’s in relaxing soundscape locations. Go inside your garden and experience it full size. You have only one problem. The rocks are haunted!

**Design and Rake Zen Gardens**
- Create Zen Gardens in relaxing soundscape locations
- Place a variety of garden items and rake sand to complete your garden designs

**Experience your Garden Full Size**
- When your garden is complete, jump into it and immerse yourself at real world scale

**Battle Yokai and Bring Peace to Your Garden**
- The rocks are haunted! Rid your garden of Japanese Yokai spirits using Samauri sword skills!

**Unlock Treasure**
- Unlock 27 garden treasure items and take your garden designs to the next level

**Timed Relaxation**
- Set a timer that tells you when to get back to reality
- Go for a walk in your garden with AI navigation, choose a place to sit, or see it from above on the viewing platform
- Try chill spots in your home environment

**3D Visualizer**
- Activate the visualizer and let your mind wander

**Zen Soundtrack**
- A Zen soundtrack to inspires you on your journey

**Sound Mixer**
- Control sound levels individually and create a custom mixed audio experience

changelog.change_log:
- Fixed startup help system visibility and cleared gardens
- Fixed save game system when upgrading

•	New help system and controls
•	New settings including sound mixing sliders
•	Misc graphics, sound, and bug fixes
